record.description: Electron micrograph of myelin sheath segment from transverse section of frog sciatic nerve, showing concentric array of dense and intermediate layers.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: See April/May 1969 issue U of C magazine, p. 32 for caption. Photos taken (possibly) by H. Fernandez-Moran for his monograph on experiments using electron microscopy. UC Mag stamp, mounted on board.
